```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(plotly)
```

## 
Interactive plot of mpg vs. wt. colored by displacement  with the markers sized by cylinder size.


```{r cars, echo = FALSE}
plot_ly(x = ~mtcars$wt*1000, 
        y = ~mtcars$mpg,
        mode = "markers", 
        color = ~mtcars$disp,
        size = ~mtcars$cyl,
        type = "scatter") 

 

```
